body_html: @garytho if you're using Python 3 you could use forkserver instead of spawn. That should make it faster. We've tried to patch it as much as we can, but in general forking isn't a safe operation in presence of multiple threads, and shouldn't be done in the middle of the program
body_text: @garytho if you're using Python 3 you could use forkserver instead of spawn. That should make it faster. We've tried to patch it as much as we can, but in general forking isn't a safe operation in presence of multiple threads, and shouldn't be done in the middle of the program
body: @garytho if you're using Python 3 you could use `forkserver` instead of `spawn`. That should make it faster. We've tried to patch it as much as we can, but in general forking isn't a safe operation in presence of multiple threads, and shouldn't be done in the middle of the program
